subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Cubs and Mets are linked by history — most notably, the 1969 pennant race — but there’s more, too. Cubs Manager Joe Maddon received his big break in baseball thanks to Mets Manager Terry Collins.
snippet: The Cubs and Mets are linked by history — most notably, the 1969 pennant race — but there’s more, too. Cubs Manager Joe Maddon received his big break in baseball thanks to Mets Manager Terry Collins.
